messages.messageBody:
--- Barbara Nostrand <nostrand@...> wrote:

> Hi.
>
> I am curious about two unrelated things:
>
> 1. Why haven't you folks announced your journal on
> the pmjs mailing
> list?

Kitsuno will have to answer this one--he's trying to
get it out to as wide an audience as possible, so
probably just hasn't gotten there yet.


>
> 2. How do I change my email address for this mailing
> list?
> My current email address will expire at the end
> of the Summer.

You've got to change your settings at the Yahoo Group
site. There's a link on all the emails that go out, at
the bottom--click on it, and it should take you there.




____________________________________________________________________________________
Need Mail bonding?
Go to the Yahoo! Mail Q&A for great tips from Yahoo! Answers users.
http://answers.yahoo.com/dir/?link=list&sid=396546091

messages.subject: Re: Samurai Archives Journal of Japanese History ready to go!
messages.msgSnippet: ... Basically because I forgot all about that list - I was a member years ago.  If anyone is a current member of the PMJS list, the staff would greatly
messages.messageBody:
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, Barbara Nostrand <nostrand@...>
wrote:
>
> Hi.
>
> I am curious about two unrelated things:
>
> 1. Why haven't you folks announced your journal on the pmjs mailing
> list?

Basically because I forgot all about that list - I was a member years
ago. If anyone is a current member of the PMJS list, the staff would
greatly appreciate a note about the journal now accepting submissions
- that would be great! We really need to get the word out

> 2. How do I change my email address for this mailing list?
> My current email address will expire at the end of the Summer.

Come to the Yahoo group website:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/samuraihistory/
And click "Edit Membership".

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Samurai Archives Journal of Japanese History ready to go!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi. I am curious about two unrelated things: 1. Why haven t you folks announced your journal on the pmjs mailing list? 2. How do I change my email address for
messages.messageBody:
Hi.

I am curious about two unrelated things:

1. Why haven't you folks announced your journal on the pmjs mailing
list?

2. How do I change my email address for this mailing list?
My current email address will expire at the end of the Summer.

Thanx.

messages.subject: Samurai Archives Journal of Japanese History ready to go!
messages.msgSnippet: The Samurai Archives Journal of Japanese history is now ready for submissions. Please see the webpage for details:
messages.messageBody:
The Samurai Archives Journal of Japanese history is now ready for
submissions. Please see the webpage for details:

http://www.samurai-archives.com/journal/index.html

We need to get the word out, and this Yahoo group just isn't going to
do that, so I request that anyone who is a member of applicable
groups, or is in a history program at a university, try to get the
word out. Again, see the above webpage for details. Feel free to
leave feedback/questions about the webpage here.

Thanks!
